titles.title: To increase the level of participation of the Small Business Administration in certain guaranteed loans for a period of one year, and for other purposes.
To increase the level of participation of the Small Business Administration in certain guaranteed loans for a period of one year, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Tax.

bill.summary: Increases, for one year after the enactment of this Act, the authorized level of participation (financing) by the Small Business Administration (SBA) in certain SBA-guaranteed loans made to small businesses.
